Why would an overworked animator go through the trouble of designing
an "extra" with 2 swords. AND show the EXACT same guy in 2 scenes
(this "mystery" guy is in 2 -separate- scenes right?)...they wouldn't
go through that much trouble for nothing remember it takes hundreds of
cells to make an animated film and lots of work (even with the aid of
computers)...it could be an inside joke for all we know.

I know that sarcastic smirk anywhere.

It's Saitou with a wig...which kind of worries me and adds the
possibility of Saitou with Kamatari tendencies. 0_0  What is more
scary Saitou with a wig or SAitou coloring his hair...green for that
matter LOL

In the manga...check maigo-chan's translation Saitou specifically
criticizes Kenshin for getting himself injured AND CAUSE SOMEONE TO BE
PERMANENTLY INJURED (the kid Yutaro)...take that Kenshin...I remember
this distinctly because this was an example of how a couple of words,
IMPORTANT words were left out of the anime (hisssss).  I read this in
the Thai translation of the manga and was surprised Nobuhiro would
"turn on" his hero.

And I used this point to discuss with my sister how Saitou is
protective of kids (Eiji + Misao)...although Miss B reinterprets the
Misao part :P

I will probably duplicate this thread on Shinsengumimb.com
so tired...just finished fanart...fingers covered with blue marker and
I posted a long message explaining why SAitou didn't anticipate
Shishio's metal headband.
